duties_responsibilities.duty: Define and deliver the best possible data product to the business by working with cross-functional teams.
Gather data requirements across domains and programs, and plan, collaborate, and manage overall roadmap delivery across all stakeholders.
Plan sprints, align with program stakeholders, and create user stories and maintain backlogs within the program and domain ADO boards.
Communicate and collaborate across all Program TDPMs, and attend or contribute to program reviews.
Lead ceremonies including sprint planning stand-ups, retrospectives, and release planning.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
